    • Method Detail

      • readMem

        public static Pix readMem(byte[] encodedData)
        Creates a 32bpp Pix object from encoded data. Supported formats are BMP, JPEG, and PNG.
        Parameters:
        encodedData - BMP, JPEG, or PNG encoded byte data.
        Returns:
        a 32bpp Pix object

      • readBytes8

        public static Pix readBytes8(byte[] pixelData,
                             int width,
                             int height)
        Creates an 8bpp Pix object from raw 8bpp grayscale pixels.
        Parameters:
        pixelData - 8bpp grayscale pixel data.
        width - The width of the input image.
        height - The height of the input image.
        Returns:
        an 8bpp Pix object

      • replaceBytes8

        public static boolean replaceBytes8(Pix pixs,
                                    byte[] pixelData,
                                    int width,
                                    int height)
        Replaces the bytes in an 8bpp Pix object with raw grayscale 8bpp pixels. Width and height be identical to the input Pix.
        Parameters:
        pixs - The Pix whose bytes will be replaced.
        pixelData - 8bpp grayscale pixel data.
        width - The width of the input image.
        height - The height of the input image.
        Returns:
        an 8bpp Pix object

      • readFile

        public static Pix readFile(java.io.File file)
        Creates a Pix object from encoded file data. Supported formats are BMP, JPEG, and PNG.
        Parameters:
        file - The BMP, JPEG, or PNG-encoded file to read in as a Pix.
        Returns:
        a Pix object

      • readBitmap

        public static Pix readBitmap(Bitmap bmp)
        Creates a Pix object from Bitmap data. Currently supports only ARGB_8888-formatted bitmaps.
        Parameters:
        bmp - The Bitmap object to convert to a Pix.
        Returns:
        a Pix object
